Posts.Content: On anther website thats very dear to me i bumped into the follwing youtube video about a doctor at MIT linking recurrence rates to surgery, i found it interesting because i have read a lot of stories of women with stage 1 or 2 turning into a stage 4!  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H8zVrYEW8vE&feature=yout Would love to your thoughts!
Posts.Title: Surgery, recurence and survival

Posts.Content: Hi , If thats a clear sign for you that something is wrong in your body, please have it checked out! I could be anything tho! Including something minor. Change of odor is a sign our body is busy with something, but that something could be anything. So have it checked out!
Posts.Title: Breast

Posts.Content: Hi Simone, so sorry to hear about your moms diagnosis! Im here for a chat and support! feel free to message me :)
Posts.Title: My mom was diagnosed, looking for a little support.

Posts.Content: Your going trough something u need a lot of strenght , courage and will power for, dont worry about some loose strands.. Its just hair. Maybe not hidding it, will give u less insecurities , that is if u feel comfortable with it, you dont have to make cancer look easy, dont be so hard on yourself, and be kind to yourself. They can adjust and adapt.   Or.. i guess the hats give u away, have you tried a bun ( if u have long hair ) or maybe a hairband? Or carry one of those rollers with u, the sticky ones?  P.S. ur a trooper, treatment and the GYM! wish i had ur strenght :)
Posts.Title: Discretely hiding hair loss in the gym

Posts.Content: Interesting! I feel the same way, eventho im yet to even FINISH all these damn treatments, im done with my 9th cycle of chemo in february. Yuck, i have 5 more to go, the last one was so harsh on me! Anyways, what ive decided to do after chemo, is to fully detox my body with juices and herbal teas and foods.  Ive made a list of alternative stuff that i would like to follow up on for recovery and preventing recurrence, like metformin, low dose aspirin etc and bunch of other supplements that boost the immunesystem, oxygen therapy and an occasional vitamin C IV, still researching other options that i can add to my routine, so a mix of alternative and conventional, and a splash of healthy , oh yeah and i would like to do some fasting every three months or two months in the hope to reset my system. I know its not exactly in the same range as your plan, but since everything is so close and far for me now this is my plan for now, and to be honest ive checked some immunotherapies out aswell, but most of them seem out of range cause u get them when ur " sick" again, and not preventive
Posts.Title: Living in Fear … Here is my Plan when My Cancer Recurs

Posts.Content: Hi, Ive also heard the same, as far as i know adding flax to your diet is always healthy! Its hard to say who it helped more than others, but i dont think trying can hurt!
Posts.Title: Flaxseed Lignans, any truth to alternative methods?

Posts.Content: Hi, mine hurts as hell! its not the tissue itself ( i think ) but the surrounding tissue that hurts, i also have a rash ( dont mean to scare you ). Ive also read on a couple of other forums some women lumps hurt as well, and my nurse said it could be cause its pressing on nerves etc.
Posts.Title: Breast cancer never hurts, should a lump hurt?

Posts.Content: Hi, sometimes masses also press on nerves etc, and also if its not cancerous it culd be anything, breast calcifications etc, I personally would have it checked out, by someone that maybe has a bit more experience in breast? Things that dont "look cancerous"could still be, or become.  Trust me, i know!
Posts.Title: Stinging in nipple and breast along with white nipple spot

Posts.Content: Hi, Is an implant your only option? There are options to use the body's own tissue to do a breastreconstruction.
Posts.Title: Need advice on breast surgery!
